resources.string: 背景设置模式(点击设置&长按复原)
取消关闭移动数据确认

Here is the manual for lin15.


But all Android 7.0 or 8.0 and can be installed xposed framework ROM can probably set the background image

 I did not use resource hooks
 But written in Java code
 

Picture quality, personally think that ordinary quality is enough
 The memory is the best half
 I can’t see any difference.
 Of course, large memory users are free


Gaussian blur, you can feel free
 The larger the fuzzy value, the more blurred


The following features are only for lineageOS15
 Please do not be naughty for everyone who is not lineageOS

1、Hide app features
 Its entrance is at lineageOS15 official desktop -> HOME SETTINGS(This option appears after long pressing the blank space on the desktop) -> More -> 隐藏应用(Hidden application) 


2、Cancellation pop prompt when you close the mobile data
 When you close the mobile data, 
 there will be no more pop-up prompts to close,

but close directly.


I am legend
 An ingenious developer


 (The above translation is from Google Translate)
Click to select image\n Long press to resume

In order to write this module, there is no reading source code.
 Also for this headache for a few days
 If you like this module
 There is also a certain amount of savings
 Then please let me drink a can of Coke.
 Thanks

 If you are not rich
 Please don't donate
 Because all features of lin15 are free Even if you don't donate
 The same can be used


 (The above translation is from Google Translate)
"Thanks to donations(Long press to save the picture)"
The picture is saved in sdcard/lin15,Thank you for your reward and encouragement~
Please pull down the quick setting panel to the bottom in portrait mode.
Please pull down the quick setting panel to the bottom in the horizontal screen state.
Unable to get accurate width and height, please pull down the quick setting panel once
Unable to get accurate width and height, please set it after horizontal screen
